analysis.description:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0ff750e5b500316d85c82c52eb9ac62e2ed6485.sol#413-427) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0ff750e5b500316d85c82c52eb9ac62e2ed6485.sol#420-424)

TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0ff750e5b500316d85c82c52eb9ac62e2ed6485.sol#436-442) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0ff750e5b500316d85c82c52eb9ac62e2ed6485.sol#441-442)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0ff750e5b500316d85c82c52eb9ac62e2ed6485.sol#450-457) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (/unique_chucks/14/0xf0ff750e5b500316d85c82c52eb9ac62e2ed6485.sol#457)
